Module com.lmax.solana4j
Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class ComputeBudgetProgram.ComputeBudgetProgramFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lmax.solana4j.programs.ComputeBudgetProgram.ComputeBudgetProgramFactory
  • Enclosing class:
    ComputeBudgetProgram
    public static final class ComputeBudgetProgram.ComputeBudgetProgramFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner factory class for building compute budget program instructions using a TransactionBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • setComputeUnitLimit

        public ComputeBudgetProgram.ComputeBudgetProgramFactory setComputeUnitLimit​(int computeUnits)
        Sets the compute unit limit.

        This method generates a transaction instruction to set the maximum number of compute units that can be used.

        Parameters:
        computeUnits - the number of compute units to set as the limit
        Returns:
        this ComputeBudgetProgramFactory instance

      • setComputeUnitPrice

        public ComputeBudgetProgram.ComputeBudgetProgramFactory setComputeUnitPrice​(long microLamports)
        Sets the compute unit price.

        This method generates a transaction instruction to set the price per compute unit, expressed in microLamports.

        Parameters:
        microLamports - the price in microLamports per compute unit
        Returns:
        this ComputeBudgetProgramFactory instance
